snippet.title: How to answer those bizarre job interview questions
snippet.description:
Business / 13 June 2013
… was asked by an interviewer at an international bank for a job as a senior java developer in London. Why the question is being asked: Rusty Rueff…

snippet.title: How smart does your phone need to be?
snippet.description:
Business / 8 November 2007
… phones, for example, rely on Java to run applications. This has turned out to be a Pandora's box for developers. "Java: develop once and test…
